about-me.headline: About me
about-me.welcome: Hi, I am a Front-end developer based in Bad Blumau, Austria. Thank you for visiting my website, where you can get an insight into my work and my passion for design and development. I am happy to introduce you to my projects and share more about my skills and experience.
about-me.firstText: Programming is a passion for me. It gives me the opportunity to develop innovative solutions through logic and creativity and to turn them into reality. The challenge of designing complex systems, solving problems and constantly learning new technologies enriches me.
about-me.secondText: With in-depth knowledge of various programming languages and frameworks and strong problem-solving skills, I am able to tackle complex challenges and develop innovative solutions.

my-skills.headline: My skills
my-skills.text: I have gained experience in building projects with varios front end technologies and concepts.

portfolio.text: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
portfolio.joinText: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.PolloLocoText: A simple Jump-and-run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and salsa bottles to fight against the chicken.

contact.headline: Contact
contact.contactMe: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributiong to your projects with my work.
contact.privacyPolice2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined

imprint.info: Information and Disclosure according to § 5 (1) ECG, § 25 MedienG, § 63 GewO, and § 14 UGB
imprint.title: Professional Title
imprint.dispute-text: Consumers residing in Austria or in another contracting state of the ODR Regulation have the possibility to resolve problems regarding the paid purchase of goods or services within the framework of online dispute resolution (according to OS, AStG). The European Commission provides a platform for this purpose: https: //ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr
imprint.copyright-text: The contents of this website are subject, as far as legally possible, to various protective rights (e.g., copyright). Any use/distribution of provided material that is prohibited by copyright requires the written consent of the website operator
imprint.disclaimer-text: Despite careful content control, the website operator of this website assumes no liability for the content of external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content. If you become aware of outgoing links that refer to a website with unlawful activity/information, please inform us accordingly to promptly remove them pursuant to § 17 Abs. 2 ECG
imprint.disclaimer-secondText: The copyrights of third parties are carefully respected by the operator of this website. If you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please provide us with the corresponding notice. Upon becoming aware of such infringements, we will promptly remove the affected content

privacy.headline: Privacy Policy
privacy.generalText1: In the following privacy policy, we inform you about the most important aspects of data processing within the framework of our website. We collect and process personal data only on the basis of legal provisions (General Data Protection Regulation, Telecommunications Act 2003).
privacy.generalText2: As soon as you, as a user, access or visit our website, your IP address, start and start and end of the session will be recorded. This is technically necessary and thus constitutes a legitimate interest within the meaning of Art 6 Para 1 lit f GDPR.
privacy.contactText: If you contact us, either via our contact form on our website or by email, the data you provide to us will be stored for six months for the purpose of processing your request or for any follow-up questions. Your transmitted data will not be passed on without your consent.
privacy.fontsText1: Our website uses fonts from Google Fonts. The service provider of this function is:
privacy.fontsText2: Google Ireland Limited Gordon House, Barrow Street Dublin 4. Ireland
privacy.fontsText3: When you visit this website, your browser loads fonts and stores them in the cache. Since you, as a visitor to the website, receive data from the service provider, Google may set or analyze cookies on your computer.
privacy.fontsText4: The use of Google Fonts serves to optimize our service and to ensure a uniform presentation of content. This constitutes a legitimate interest within the meaning of Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR.
privacy.fontsText5: For more information about Google Fonts, please visit the following link:
privacy.fontsText6: For more information on how Google handles user data, please refer to Google's privacy policy:
privacy.fontsText7:
Google also processes the data in the USA but is
committed to the EU-US Privacy Shield.
privacy.rightsHeadline: Your rights as a data subject
privacy.rightsText1: You as a data subject have the right to:
privacy.rightsList5: Revocation and objection to data processing
privacy.rightsText2: If you suspect that your data has been processed in violation of data protection law, you have the option to file a complaint with us (c.cigan@gmx.net) or the data protection authority.
privacy.contactHeadline: You can reach us at the following contact details:
privacy.name: Cecil Cigan
